entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.
